sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import Moment from 'react-moment' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const ExperienceDashboard = props => { const { experience, deleteExperience } = props const experiences = experience.map(exp => ( {exp.title} {exp.from} - {exp.to === null ? (' Now ') : ({exp.to})} )) return (

Experience Credentials

{experiences}
Company Title Years
) } ExperienceDashboard.propTypes = { experience : PropTypes.array.isRequired, deleteExperience: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } export default ExperienceDashboard
